errors.error_description: The command to install dependencies refers to a non-existent file named `deps.txt` instead of the correct `requirements.txt` file.
correction_candidates: Change the command to `pip install -f deps.txt`.
Create a new file `deps.txt` with the contents of `requirements.txt`.
Change the command to `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
